title: If Riot won't nerf Cho, then they should-
body:
at least buff the fountain laser so that it kills him in a reasonable amount of time

http://i.imgur.com/s5k3IgO.jpg

replies.body: Cho is not hard to kill if you build right.
Hi, this is a meme (I added a picture :D!) and not a point about balance. Thanks, bye now
True but your meme is based in balance facts.

EVERYONE HIDE!!!

IT'S THE GAMEPLAY PEOPLE!!!!!!!
Hide your memes, hide your gifs.
Hide your happiness =D
And hide your husband........wait what???

Yes..

Fountain can build right...

10/10

Report fountain clearly noob... Not counterbuilding Cho

>5/7

FIFY

I'll give you bork but only a complete noob would build ldr on fountain, fountain deals true damage which can't be amplified so the passive doesn't matter and can't be mitigated by armor meaning the armor pen doesn't matter. Fountain should go full infinity edges to amplify it's extremely high base ad and attack speed.

"Buff the fountain laser."

Because it doesn't kill a champion fast enough honestly means you fucked up somewhere with your balancing.

In Season 4, the Fountain Laser literally would've been the last thing anyone would've even considered mentioning as a balance issue.
Sir. Do you need a map? We're in M&G, not Gameplay.
{{champion:81}} "Who needs a map?"
Clearly the person I replied to does. Now, don't you have to go have fanfic made of you, Ezreal?
I know it's M&G but this is actually a valid point given he can flash+r and walk away. It's pretty obnoxious but whatever.
Corrupt Bliss. Fuck im 1 day late for the joke.
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/C-7A1UOW0AAkgs0.jpg
I get the joke, doesn't mean it's not true.
tbh they need to just buff the fountain period because if any hp heavy champ builds {{item:3193}} they can quite literally dive fountain long enough for a kill or 2

Fountain Laser should do 30% max hp true damage per hit. Everything dies in 4 ticks (2 seconds with a 2.0 attack speed).

Now, the mega fed ADC can dive your platform while Cho tanks for 2 seconds and get the penta for free.
If you're a runaan's ADC with BT and have multiple enemies to be lifestealing off of, you could lifesteal tank that for a decent time.
well a simple solution would just have the fountain instakill you if the laser has been on you for 5 seconds
You are not gonna heal for enough HP before the laser wrecks you. You might survive one extra shot but that's it.
I'm not saying tank it indefinitely, but you could probably get 2 extra shots, and 3 seconds is a long time for an ADC to be attacking anything.

2 seconds is nowhere near enough to heal for more than 50% of your total HP.

Because after 2 seconds, you will have taken 120% of your maximum HP as true damage. Meaning you will need to have healed at least 21% to survive more than 2 seconds, and 51% for anything past 2.5 seconds.

Something like a twitch with runaans can probably do it for a long time. 

Long time meaning 3-4 seconds

He'd need the enemy champions lined up and he would need at least 2 sources of lifesteal.

Even then, he'd likely end up with only 1 extra second because he would not have the total sustain required (because hurricane bolts do less damage).
Idk Twitch ulting with the entire enemy team in a line may be able to tank a couple extra shots.

Such evil.

Username checks out.

Cho fighting in the fountain? We DOTA now boys.

http://i.imgur.com/afk6Onl.jpg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=trzRYlSJHrs
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZrzwaJX_Nhk 
abusing warmogs. But still.
thought fountian laser did true damage
It does, but OP is implying that Cho has so much HP that he can walk out before it kills him
To be fair it does 1000 true damage a second. It would take the laser about 7-8 seconds to kill a late game cho.
Even longer if he's using Sterak's Gage.
they did nerf cho 7.15
ISSA MEME BOIl

At least he has to take damage to do that . . . lol
{{champion:51}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3046}} {{champion:222}}

Everyone forgets about {{champion:13}} fountain dives.

You can ult an entire lane of super minions to fountain dive with you and you can walk out taking no fountain aggro.
but at least that looks funny
They dont have to deal with cho in lane buff top laners that are bad vs him
